name: Spoon Thief
description: Spoon Thief - The main character has a goal to steal all the spoons from the restaurants, currently in early development, 4 levels, 2 characters, and much more to come if this game receives any positive feed back. The current state is mainly just a test to show how it may work, if I continue this project progression will be shown much easier, added achievement, and possibly much more based on if anyone says anything, or how I feel about what I think it needs. The final goal of the game (Not implemented in the Game Jam release) is to steal all the spoons in order to build a spoon sculpture.
